item.title: Version 1.0.2
item.description:
tibok 1.0.2 - Bug Fixes and Improvements

What's Fixed

  • Keyboard Input Routing - Fixed issue where keyboard input was incorrectly routed to other applications instead of the editor
  • WordPress Selection - Fixed bug where WordPress selection would revert to Jekyll when converting between static site generators
  • Security - All releases now properly code-signed and notarized by Apple

Release Details

  • ✓ Fully signed with Developer ID Application certificate
  • ✓ Notarized by Apple for Gatekeeper approval
  • ✓ No security warnings on installation
  • ✓ macOS 14.0 (Sonoma) or later, Apple Silicon (ARM64)

item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
tibok 1.0 - Initial Release

The first public release of tibok markdown editor with all essential features:

  • Clean, distraction-free markdown editor with live preview
  • 35+ slash commands for markdown formatting and structure
  • Integrated Git workflow (stage, commit, push, pull, branch management)
  • Direct WordPress publishing support
  • Plugin system for extensibility
  • Math/LaTeX rendering with bundled KaTeX
  • Workspace and file management with smart filtering
  • Dark/light mode with system preference support
  • Customizable editor fonts, line height, and preview width
  • Keyboard shortcuts for all major functions

System Requirements

macOS 14.0 (Sonoma) or later, Apple Silicon (ARM64)
